title: level 5 but still reflected as level 1 on boards
body: Hello, I would like to know if there is a bit of a delay for updating account levels?  I got to level 5 last night but my account is still reflected as level one.  Thanks very much for any help.

replies.body:
For a lot of the boards, level 6 is required to post/reply in a lot of the Sub-boards here. Just making this post caused a sync between your Boards and Summoner profiles, so you should be good to go now.

Happy Posting!
There probably is a small delay.  And to my knowledge, the level you are doesn't change anything on the Boards.  I'd just give it a day or so to catch up.
